Class QPGraphController.NodeCreator

Enclosing class:
QPGraphController
protected class QPGraphController.NodeCreator
extends diva.canvas.interactor.AbstractInteractor

An inner class that places a node at the clicked-on point on the screen, if control-clicked with mouse button 1. This needs to be made more customizable.
